title: Line highlight plugin — highlight
text: range character indicating range used, example 2-5 highlight 2 5. Also can highlight two ranges following way 2-5,10-13,19.

title: Line highlight plugin — highlight
code: if (FALSE) { highlighter::highlighter(   "print('Hello, world!')\ncat <- \"Aristofanes\"\nstr(some_variable)",   language = "r",   plugins = list(     highlight(       range = "1-2"     )   ) ) }
